def calculate_profit(buy_price, sell_price, amount, buy_fee, sell_fee, gas):
    revenue = sell_price * amount
    cost = buy_price * amount
    total_fees = (cost * buy_fee) + (revenue * sell_fee)
    net_profit = revenue - cost - total_fees - gas
    return net_profit
